website_summaries.verdict: AirPods set the standard for wireless earbuds, and they're still arguably the best on the market.
pros: Smart and discreet with unrivalled portability
Automatic connection for iPhone and iPad

customer_reviews.title: be aware, they are the new airpods but come in the first gen charging case
customer_reviews.text: This is not an issue if you don't wish to pay the extra £40 for the wireless charging case up front, you can always buy a case at a later date for £79 from the apple store... but if you are looking for a wireless charging experience, then these are not the ones for you.. I initially thought I have been sent the first gen headphones as there are no obvious changes in appearance, but after doing a bit of research, you get a first gen charging case with the new 2nd gen headphones.. they are the latest model as advertised. so I am happy man now.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Karl M Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Parcel came, no AirPods
customer_reviews.text: The parcel itself came, however when I opened the box I saw that the AirPods box had no cellophane rap around it. Once opened the AirPods case and AirPods were missing. This is such a shame as they were bought for a family member. I’d suggest just buying them from apple.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Should it be like this?
customer_reviews.text: The case wobbles side to side and the hands free Siri activation don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Only upgrade if you have to.
customer_reviews.text: Don't see or hear much difference compared to the previous model, I get about an extra hour of battery life compared to my previous model (mainly used for Skype meetings), otherwise don't see any difference. Left the five stars because the sound and build quality are at the superb Apple standards and have bluetooth paired to every device, Android, iOS, Mac or PC I have connected them to.
customer_reviews.author: Littlebrook

customer_reviews.title: No alternative
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my Pixel (android) phone as there isn't a proper android manufacturer alternative, some features don't work on adnoird but overall it works great and the quality is Apple. My only criticism is that Apple should have their Airpod app on the android store and at this price the wireless charging case should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Ozgur O.

customer_reviews.title: Apple AirPods
customer_reviews.text: The Apple AirPods I got are brilliant amazing sound quality couldn’t be any more happier definitely well recommended thanks
customer_reviews.author: wayne lyth

customer_reviews.title: Received a used item wax clearly present!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received a used item with wax clearly present. Not new not happy
customer_reviews.author: s court

customer_reviews.title: Dont order!
customer_reviews.text: Dont order! Arrived unsealed without Airpods and charging case. Only charging cable in with paperwork.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same thing as urBeats 3, but wireless and more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable in the exact moment you put them in your ears, but that's all. In terms of sound quality they're just okay. Almost no bass like urBeats 3 which is disappointing considering the amount of money you pay for them. Bluetooth connectivity is disappointing as well: my phone detected the airpods, but once disconnected I didn't managed to pair them again. I expected a lot more, but again, I've got to say that their performance is terrible. My Sennheiser Momentum got a better sound and they're a lot cheaper than these.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The best service you can expect from a earbuds in which case AirPods provide. The sound quality is better then expectation and you will not be disappointed. Also is comfortable and you will not feel anything in your ears because its light.
customer_reviews.author: Nafeul I.

customer_reviews.title: Apple Air Pods -v- Clones
customer_reviews.text: It's my daughters birthday and she has been banging on about these bloody Air pods. Well the Air pods were ordered and delivered next day in time for my little girl Birthday, the look on her face was fantastic and the product in question looks small for the price but the quality, visualisation and audible volume are brilliant. Would totally recommend if your a Apple lover.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Haughton

customer_reviews.title: They just work!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a birthday present and I was in awe of the whole set up process. I am not an apple products person and have had limited exposure to them but seeing these little pods instantly find and connect to her iPhone with no input was astounding. Then they know when to cut in and out as they are used and easily located via the phone if lost. I have to admit that the little apple eco system works amazingly although I am not convinced the entry price into the eco system is actually worth the jump.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Missing airpods
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt very happy with the way my package was delivered. It was left out in the open for anyone to see but it's not the company fault. I came home and my my package only had the airpod case and the charger, I didn't actually have the airpods that was supposedly coming with it. I dont know who's fault it is, but everything does looks genuine. Can't speak for the actual airpods because I never had the chance to even touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: second pair ordered after refund received  for non working 1st one and even Still NOT Working
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd airpod I buy on Amazon , I’ve returned the 1st one bc left airpod was not working at all. I just received the 2nd airpod and still the same ! the left airpod is not working at all ! I will of course return it again and ask for refund or try with the Apple support but my advice DO NOT BUY APPLE AIRPOD ON AMAZON !!
customer_reviews.author: Carlo C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to enjoy this AirPods but I was very surprise to see their build quality. The top of the charging box was very loose and the AirPods had a sharp edge around them. They were so badly build that I have my doubts if they are originals. Right now im in the process of returning them.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: This is not the latest model..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as the title of the product reads "Apple AirPods with Charging Case (Latest Model)", thinking it would be the Apple Airpods 2. However, when it came it was the old model.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Omair Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Very neat, but drop out of ears vey easily
customer_reviews.text: They are very neat, the case works very well etc etc, but they have dropped out of my ears like 3 times in the first day of use, it’s like you have to keep your head really still when walking, I just think it’s a huge design flaw, very very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Sorry for my misunderstanding.. 1st gen and 2nd gen looks exactly same unless wireless charging case. So i cancelled the exchange. Thanks for fast delivery and sorry again for my mistake
customer_reviews.author: Wj

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately received the faulty ones. They do not connect or reset. I am sending them back for a refund, and will buy directly in Apple store. However, when they connected the first time, they were great, excellent sound and confortable.
customer_reviews.author: emilie_chx

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the cheaper copies
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an Apple fan but having used these airpods attached to an iphone and an ipad I have to say that they are way better than any of my other bluetooth earphones/buds. The noise cancellation is great and the fit is very comfortable. The sound quality is amazing. I'm not sure if they are worth the cost compared to others, but as far as build quality and performance is concerned they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mac

customer_reviews.title: Mix up
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered these and was very excited and got this..... return has started and I hope this doesn’t happen to anyone else as it’s really annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is better than i expected and the ease of connecting them to your phone is pretty good. the charging case was the biggest selling point for me as most bluetooth headphones don't last long at all. It's a shame they aren't more comfortable as they start to hurt your ears after an hour also if you are in a noisy environment they let a lot of sound in. Having said all that I've had to send them off for repair because the right airpod has died after 3 months use and won't do anything anymore.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Utterly liberating!
customer_reviews.text: The old corded headphones were always a pain to untangle and, when I turned my head, the cord often snagged and pulled the ear bud out. These are liberating - no cord hassles, no tugging out, lightweight and work like a dream. Only worry is what will happen when the rechargeable battery reaches the end of life when, I gather, it can’t be replaced, but meanwhile these are fantastic and I wish I’d splashed out on them long ago.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Avoid and don’t believe the hype!!
customer_reviews.text: Been Apple since iPhone 4 and always enjoyed the products and ease of use. These are a nightmare novelty for posers, do not waste your time or money on these! Brand new out the box and already returning in less than 24hrs. Ridiculous connection issues needing hard resets. Sometimes work sometimes don’t. Using 8plus iPhone all up to date software. No reasons or excuses. Spent more time trying to make them work then actually using them. Good job!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly these only arrived this morning so I can't really review battery life, (but I've read it's good). But I can comment on the rest. Sound quality is way better than expected (I'm an ex sound engineer) and the comfort is way way better than the Apple wired buds. Walking around I don't feel as though they're going to fall out either. Expensive but 'they just work'. Amazon delivery to pickup point was swift and trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: Rockit99

customer_reviews.title: When they work, they are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas. They worked great until after two weeks they would fail to connect. They would not reset I tried everything. Then I reset them by pressing the hold button for a minute. They then worked. The issue has just occurred again. Apple says there is nothing wrong with them. When they work they do the job and are fantastic. However when they stop for some reason it’s like they are knackered. I am pretty sure I got an open box even though the packaging was sealed. Definitely have some sort of defect. Either way I will get my money back if I can’t have this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Junior H

customer_reviews.title: Yes they’re worth it
customer_reviews.text: Yes they’re expensive. Yes part of that is because they are apple but I have still been super impressed by these. Great sound quality and seamless connectivity coupled with a great battery life.. I use these on the long train commute 2 to 3 times a week and for cycling at the weekend. The only annoyance is changing the volume I really do miss the online vol control the normal apple headphones have.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin_KA

customer_reviews.title: what can you say about perfection?
customer_reviews.text: these are very good if you need to speak or hear what some one has to say just pop out a pod and it pauses the music pop it back in and it continues they also do other stuff which when I get an hour of nothingness to do will play with them to access the other witch craft they offer!
customer_reviews.author: keviboy

customer_reviews.title: AirPods. Cool-looking. Work OK.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present. Worked well for 9 months. Then right AirPod went quiet relative to left. Apple replaced this FoC. Then realised left AirPod was somewhat quieter than the new right AirPod. Fit depends on your ear shape. No noise blocking to speak of. Pairing and use with iPhone and MacBook is good. Battery life and case-based charging is good.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyGreenParrot

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD SELLER - NOT APPLE
customer_reviews.text: Fraud seller - listing says Apple AirPods 2nd generation, however have received a £15 version. Incredibly misleading ad! Do not purchase if you want the Apple product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love my AirPods
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is as expected from apple, which is great. no issues pairing these with my iPhone 11 and the battery life is true to claim. the AirPods go for about 4 hours on one charge. I found these comfortable to ware and haven't had an signal drop issues between AirPods and earphones. Being white this does pick up first daily so I highly recommend getting a case for these to protect your AirPods from normal ware and tear. noise cancelling is ok for when your using the mic but music wise, not so much, you can hear what music is blasting if the volume high enough so be aware of that if thats an issue for you.
customer_reviews.author: Raging Pixie

customer_reviews.title: High quality but pricey enough.
customer_reviews.text: Light, comfortable, the lack in battery life at loud volumes is made up for with the portable charging case. Could be a little less expensive. The earbuds have never died on any of my commutes so you can expect a couple of hours at least on a pretty loud volume. I do like them a lot. The lack of wires is amazing. Kinda prefer my headphones for the enhanced bass they deliver, but these are awesome for their portability and extreme comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Apple quality but with missing features
customer_reviews.text: Usual apple quality, sound quality is great and they fit well without having the usual true wireless problem and discomfort of having the buds fitting into the eardrum. Negatives are the volume and phone controls aren’t accessible from the pods, you can just skip tracks by tapping and pause play, you have to use the phone controls or Siri to adjust volume and answer the phone. Not an issue for me but a surprise at this price point. There is also little noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Major flaws in design! Average product and hence high price!
customer_reviews.text: What a terrible way to finish a fine product - if you are planning to ‘waste’ your money - this is a no brainer! Good noise cancellation but at higher volume - sound is so loud that the person next to you will be annoyed! So ideally should be used at medium volume ☹️ Specially when you are travelling by train etc There is no indicator for battery charging status on the case- you have to open and see a small light inside the case
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: 2nd generation? Everything looks the same to me
customer_reviews.text: I am usually very satisfied with all Apple products, however, this one is rather disappointing. No noise cancellation features, same sound quality and battery life to the previous generation. I regret upgrading to this one. It is obvious that Apple gave no upgrades to this version as they were expecting to release the new fancy AirPods Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Marios

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable  - Android user
customer_reviews.text: what? an android user praising apple? impossible. Well no, no its not. Apple make brilliant hardware and implement it in a very accessible fashion, granted they charge a lot for it, but thats thie market and they do it bloody well. My mum, my sister and my cousin sister all bought these because they dont like silicon/ in ear earphones and the ones that are not in ear, are mostly garbage, however the airpods ghave evolved that line up and made a decent soudning set of earphones while mainitng the lack of protruding in ear silicon tips. Bravo to them.
customer_reviews.author: Muneeb J.

customer_reviews.title: Volume is only like 50/75% when it's at max volume after an update with OnePlus 6T (I assume)
customer_reviews.text: As a whole the airpods worked great. Had them for like a month and a half but for some reason over the last like 2 weeks, the volume is only going to like 50/75% when it's at max volume. I'd be quite techy and tried a lot of different things but nothing worked. I narrowed it down to being a problem with OnePlus 6T and the Airpods (2nd Gen) not being compatible after an update I assume. Please take note of this before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apple have got it right its this one.
customer_reviews.text: Love my Pods. I can use them whilst out walking and hear with clarity, but at the same time, not get myself run over! Has great fullness of sound. I use it for phone calls, music and general use. I have seperate noise cancelling headphones for trains, flights etc so that side is of no consequence for me. The only downside for me, which I cannot work out, is why the pods don't work when I use them on Skype or Zoom on my Mac.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goslin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 150 but they are decent
customer_reviews.text: I don't think they are worth 150 quid but they are nice charging box is nice probs costs like 5 quid to make Audio quality ok not amazing comfy in my ears they don't drop out they aren't heavy battery life seems really good to be fair I think I more fair price would be 70 quid max
customer_reviews.author: luis i.

customer_reviews.title: Probably a second-hand set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my husband as a Christmas gift. He started using them on 24 December. By end of January the were not working anymore. We took them to an Apple store and were told that the headphones are faulty but are outside the warranty period. They were only purchased mid November and in use for about 5 weeks! This means I was sold an old second hand set or otherwise can’t explain why they are outside the Warranty period??? There is nowhere to contact the seller to request a replacement set because the return window has closed!!
customer_reviews.author: Denisa Chytilova

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these a bit pricey but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool, they pair with your phone seamlessly, you just tap them to do various functions, set up on your phone, as soon as you put them in your ears they connect, if you remove them the music or media pauses. They are pricey but they are really good. Worth every penny. I did contemplate a cheaper alternative but after hearing a few reviews from friends I'm glad I went for the apple version. battery status of the case and pods show up on the screen of your phone and even give them a name, which you can change via phone settings. If you like apple don't buy a cheap alternative save up and get these.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to purchase so was a little anxious after some of them. Everywhere else was out of stock and as they were a gift I took my chances. My daughter is delighted, so much easier and more comfortable than wired earphones. Item perfect condition as was the packaging and connected immediately to her iPhone. She is impressed with the battery life and generally thrilled. The price is high but she was getting through so many corded ones that they are so far cost effective!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hines

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit this was some of the most expensive tech I’ve purchased. £150+ on headphones is a lot for me to justify but my god they’re fantastic. I’ve always listened to music in the car and occasionally when at home when alone but these things have just opened up a world of new music because I can listen in the bath, on the train, everywhere. Hooked up to an iPhone X and Spotify on high res the sound quality is utterly sublime. They just work, and work so damn well that I can’t live without them anymore
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ford

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these AirPods. Every time I see them, I just want to put them into my ears and play some music!! They’re super comfortable (that might be a bit subjective though), the sound quality is incredible, and the touch features work extremely well. I didn’t expect them to work so well on phone calls, but they’re absolutely perfect, so this was an added benefit. I wold highly recommend this Apple product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound !
customer_reviews.text: Well after some weeks I finally decided to go for these. I normally prefer on ear headphones, purely for the sound. I just wanted something smaller & more comfortable. Upon ordering I still wasn't confident as I find in ear earphones simply don't deliver deep tones and quality audio. When I opened them, they simply paired to my iPhones. Simples ! The sound stunned me. I cannot believe how these things sound, they are comfortable, and easy to use. I did purchase the silicone ear caps so they grip better in ear. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Eriksson

customer_reviews.title: Great Design or Great Marketing - Unfortunately Stopped Working After Only 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell the difference, sound wise between these and my £30 Sony wired headphones, but my daughter loved them. Great design or just great marketing? Hats off to Apple for re-inventing this sector. Definitely a must have status/fashion item for my teenage daughter if albeit a little 'emperors new clothes' for her Luddite dad! A pity one of the Airpods stopped working after only 2 weeks - had to return :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kieron P

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting.
customer_reviews.text: Best £160 i spent. They fit really well, though the right one doesn’t always stay in my ear when I’m moving around, a few others who reviewed seemed to also have this problem, but i don’t think that’s a design flaw on apple’s part. They do have a limited range however, if you go beyond a certain distance from the device they’re connected to, audio quality will start to degrade, and eventually disconnect, at least when using FaceTime. Overall though, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product!
customer_reviews.text: I always thought people looked a bit silly whilst wearing these but I was getting annoyed at having to constantly be tangled in wires from my previous Apple headphones and found that the sound quality was terrible. Ended up taking the plunge and purchasing the airpods and it's one of the best buys I've made! They are perfect for whilst working out as I am no longer being tangled in my wires and love that I can walk around the house wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if product or supplier error
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a replacement which is not panning out to be any better. I highly doubt this is an Apple issue. Intermittent charging. Earphones individually seem to have problems either charging or audio being activated. Can’t say I’m pleased with this product at all. But again highly doubt this is an Apple issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Useless with some non Apple products
customer_reviews.text: This product works with Apple iPhones and iPads brilliantly, and with the kind of simplicity you expect from Apple. Unfortunately, I bought them to work with the Surface Pro I use for work in lockdown, and they just will not connect to it. I thought Bluetooth is Bluetooth and they should work with anything, but two IT professionals couldn’t get them paired either. In the end, a very experienced IT guy said “forget it, these things are notorious for being unreliable with Surface Pros...”. On that basis, they’ve gone back to Amazon. Real shame as, when they work, they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: AJM1963

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely brilliant, I love everything about them and am rediscovering music for the first time in years because they are so easy to wear and use. The sound quality is amazing (even for someone partially deaf like me), and the battery life is brilliant. My previous wired earphones were quite expensive, but the quality was nowhere near as good as this. Am so pleased I bought these, they are worth every penny :-)
customer_reviews.author: Fay88

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Apple air pods
customer_reviews.text: No problems from my son who wanted them for his birthday. Came well packaged. Charged up well and sync with his phone. He loves them. I used them once and the sound quality was excellent and noice cancellation was amazing considering they are tiny little ear pieces. I on the other hand found them expensive, but then they were a birthday present for my son and you pay for the name and they are genuine.
customer_reviews.author: leahleo

customer_reviews.title: Expensive fashion accessories....
customer_reviews.text: These expensive things are for my son, they lasted 2 days!!!. Then the left one stopped working. After trying the Apple fix they both stopped working!! An hour of Apple tech support online and in the local store...ooops faulty pair so advised to order a replacement. They arrive tomorrow.....not holding my breath these will be any better but feel sorry for my son and all others who are victims of the Apple con!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily for listening to music and making calls etc. the sound quality is very good and the syncing with the iphone is also seamless and consistent. Are they over priced? Yes! But arent they all?! i bought a pair of inferior copy cat ear phones that advertised fabulous sound quality etc at fraction of the price and found out the hard way that you get what you pay for. Now i have these im very happy and would recommend to anyone in the market for a decent pair of wireless air pods. You really do get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: d m kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not in the same league or comparable to proper wireless headphones for the same price
customer_reviews.text: As someone who owns both the airpods and a pair of proper over ear wireless headphones for the same price, i can safely say airpods are a huge rip off, not worth the money, no where near the same league as proper headphones for the same price. The fact apple have the cheek to price them at the same value as proper good headphones when they are providing the poor sound quality they are is an actual joke, they are shocking for their price. The only good feature is their battery life and they are long lasting too.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst investments I have made. Using these on public transport is impossible unless the music is on full blast and then it’s more probable that the person you’re sitting next to will bear it better than you. There’s hardly any noise cancellation so you can hear everything going on around you even that really kid person on the phone sitting a few seats away from you. I have to clean these nearly everyday otherwise the grill gets all clogged up and you can’t hear it (I’ve had them for 3 months and already had to take a trip to apple). Overall disappointing I would of expected better from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: BEST WIRELESS HEADPHONE
customer_reviews.text: Very fussy about my headphones but wanted some of these due to the amazing reviews - I was sceptical as the sound on the wired apple headphones is atrocious and I normally use Bose. I was very surprised!! The packaging is neat and the tiny charging case is amazing, makes it so easy to carry them. The earphones themselves are very light and the sound surprisingly good. Of course they are not Bose quality and I didn’t expect them to be but they are good enough for my daily commute and to use on holiday by the pool/at the beach. Charge in super quick time which is also a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great companions during lockdown especially
customer_reviews.text: I chose these for my long walks and so as to be able to listen to my new found Audible books on the go. They stay in my ears comfortably all the time, have a perfectly clear sound while still allowing me to hear birdsong, bikers coming up behind me and greetings. Remembering where I stopped listening, to take them out, is a bonus. The little white charging box is tactile and neat. The only thing is that it is fairly small and easy to slip out of a pocket so take care where you place it.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these to use whilst running. Ok to begin with but as soon as I put a sweat on they fall out. Bought hooks to attach over my ears to prevent this issue. After a few weeks my left ear phone stopped working. Amazon were brill and sent me a new pair, seem to work for now but a bit disappointed that they fall out on a run
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ear fitment.
customer_reviews.text: Not been using long. I am unable to use for my first intention, that was running. As they just fall out, even with adaptive support, they fall out. My Apple cabled ones suit the purpose. Charging very quick to. It’s great when you connect to IPad, a battery status shows in the screen for both the pods and their case. Other wise perfect. connection via Bluetooth excellent. Would have been five stars if they were fit for my first purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bru Bru

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: AirPods were packaged well by amazon. The product itself is fantastic! Was a bit hesitant at first because of the price but I can safely say they’re worth every penny! Pros: -Sound quality is nice and clear -Easy to setup -Aesthetically pleasing -Lightweight -Fits in the ear perfectly -Charges quickly -Long lasting battery Cons: -Cost Overall these are great! Can’t recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Poor Service
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, however the one that I received was faulty and was agreed to be sent back for repair after many hours of dealing with people in call centres. I am however sill waiting for my product to be repaired around 3 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son is autistic and we have gone through a lot of headphones for him in the last few years! He wanted these to keep them discreet and they are great. Very expensive like all apple products but good quality. A little fiddly but he’s got used to them. We bought separate silicone ear hooks to help them stay in while he’s on the move as they don’t fit his ears properly yet
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. L. Bent

customer_reviews.title: Item not received
customer_reviews.text: Well I would write a product review, but all we received was a bottle of Optrex in their place.... absolutely fuming! It appears there are a lot of reviews with similar experiences, so watch out.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect On The Move But Less So With Your Grooves
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly portable, perfect for Apple products but cheaper and better sounding alternatives available for Android. Sound quality is decent but not for headphones at this price point. Quite comfy. Convenience, battery life and technology wise first class. Great for out and about but not for serious listening. Like most Apple products they just work...at a price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product but needs better way of blocking outside noise.
customer_reviews.text: I still wish Apple would put a seal on these, they not the loudest and they are very poor at blocking out background noise. I use these on aeroplanes a lot and you struggle to hear over the engine noise. Great sound clarity and such an amazing product for usability and fantastic quick charge.
customer_reviews.author: Lumster

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item delivered
customer_reviews.text: When the product was delivered, I received the wrong item. Instead of AirPods, I received hand moisturiser.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great when you’re sitting still, but.....
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is pretty good when you’re sitting or standing standing still. They’re really comfortable in your ears. When you start moving around, they change their quality quite a lot. They constantly drop in and out. It drives you crazy. They just keep stuttering. Sometimes it just switches off. It’s such a shame because they sound pretty good (they’re not Bose) and they’re easy and comfortable to use/wear. If apple can sort out the stuttering, they’d be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but you know what you are getting.
customer_reviews.text: The Mrs wanted these for her iPhone, I can understand why given the comfort and how well they integrate. Myself, I would not purchase these given the mediocre sound quality, and the high cost. There are so many better options out there which sound so much better, but I do appreciate the apple thing, and how well they fit into the ecosystem. You know what your getting with apple and that speaks a lot I suppose. Seem well made and do work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Fearny

customer_reviews.title: Pain when using it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. There’s no good noise cancellation, you hear all the background noise, but to me the worst part is that I always have a pain in my ears after using it for 30min. I’ve used just a couple times and unfortunately Amazon said I missed the return window. I’m really sorry but this product isn’t good at all for me...
customer_reviews.author: Mackert UK

customer_reviews.title: Worth It - a Great Experience Overall!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Great fit - They have never fallen out - Great sound quality. You can probably find better out there, but it is solid - Easy to use with features that allow you to change the song with a few taps - Quick charging - You don't have to charge them often because the battery lasts long and the case will charge the earphones in between uses Cons - I've personally found noise cancelling to be a little inconsistent. Sometimes I won't hear anything in a packed gym, and other times I can hear the outside clearly (max volume on all occasions)
customer_reviews.author: Humzah

customer_reviews.title: Ooopps, build quality alert!  But still good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift, sound is good tbh, no complaints. Quality of build questionable. The two halfs on one pod are no quite matched smooth but honestly they are still pretty good and not worth me returning. Disappointed not perfect but picked up for 130 delivered and missus chuffed to bits. Paired with my android to test... Yeah pretty damned good. Shame about the slight imperfection. Guess it's a gamble, you can always return them lol
customer_reviews.author: GrimGDog

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this purchase. Genuine Apple AirPods they come with a charging cable so don’t be tempted to buy one for the add on price. They work so well you tell Siri to turn your volume up and down, they automatically pause when you take one out of your ear. I’m so pleased will be buying a set for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Amy E. Eade

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my 1st gen AirPods that I have used almost every day for the last couple of years and were suffering from the battery life being very short. I am sad to say that these are really disappointing for an Apple product. The lid is loose already- looser than my two year old airpods by a noticeable amount in fact- and I have a number of issues with the left AirPod not connecting when I put it in. Unsure if I have had a dud pair sent to me but suffice to say that I’m not happy. Not sure how I get a replacement pair as option isn’t available to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Happy to recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Tried five different wireless earbuds before deciding to spend the money on the Apple EarPods - worth every penny for the quality, the ease of use and the comfort. I dislike full noise cancellation products, but these EarPods have just enough while not blocking out everything around me; important as I use them most when out and about (commenting etc) so gentle awareness of my environment is important. Over a week of ownership and I haven’t charged them since the first charge.
customer_reviews.author: Moira

customer_reviews.title: It's a great build with even greater potential!
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys I really unfortunately do not see a significant difference to this product and past models and I will tell you why. Apart from receiving about 30 minutes additional battery life I have yet to see further enhancing features to offset the weakness of previous versions. The Apple logo and build is still immense quality and blurtooth paying on every device is convenient. Another downside is Apple should have the Airpod application on the android store to make it accessible to all users and at this value the charging case ideally be as part of the end price.
customer_reviews.author: Haji saab

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with product based on cost. I’ve had issues with sound quality and one of the pods doesn’t work at all intermittently. When I spoke with Apple they were fairly dismissive of the issue and put it down to user error!!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Can't repair or get a refund
customer_reviews.text: My son's airpods don't work and we have been told they can't be repaired unless we pay £90. He spent all of his birthday money on them and only had them at the end of February. We now can't contact anyone about this and have a pair of airpods that don't work properly. To spend this amount of money for an item that can only be used for a few months is not OK.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Barresi

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones
customer_reviews.text: Apple products are always good but also seem to have a large downfall. The sound quality on these are great however when playing a song at a high volume, as a bystander you can hear it through the earphones very clearly. Even when standing on the opposite side of a room.. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: J98

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect! Best online price too!
customer_reviews.text: Was sceptical as to whether these would be worth it, but needed an improvement for office video-calling to remove fan-noise. Seamless connection with my iPhone 7 and 2017 MacBook Pro 13". Great music quality. Beautiful Siri integration, battery life notification etc. Could not be easier to use, once again Apple definitely have delivered here! Faultless.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Box was empty
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to receive a box without AirPods. The only item in the box was the charging lead. This was bought as a gift so had to buy again elsewhere as had lost confidence in buying again.
customer_reviews.author: hollygirl

customer_reviews.title: Why no tap volume control?
customer_reviews.text: These are well known and I bought as an upgrade to cheap airpod clones. The instruction leaflet omits mention of what the LED light states mean or how to enable the iPhones airpod battery level indicator. Extraordinarily poor documentation from Apple. Not great value for money but I knew that. I'll report back on battery life. The option of volume control by tap and not Siri would have added big value for me.
customer_reviews.author: MuzikMad

customer_reviews.title: A bit dubious at first but .......
customer_reviews.text: A bit dubious at first having read that some customers had problems but I decided to buy them. Having returned items previously, I have never had a problem with Amazon getting a refund. These earbuds are the genuine article. Tip! A certain way to test for genuine Apple earbuds is to use the “Find my phone” facility on an iPhone. Genuine Apple buds will be detected. Counterfeits won’t. All in all I am very happy with my purchase and going by my experience, I am happy to recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these...how I didn't buy these sooner I don't know...so easy to use...don't have to keep getting my phone out ..just a little tap on the ear-bud and a way you go....love them... Few days after review.. Siri stopped working I couldn't tap the ear-bud to call someone. .totally gutted...as I really liked these.. looking further into the reviews I am now worried are they the real thing?as I haven't seen them at this price anywhere..:-(
customer_reviews.author: sammy 10

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Product failed after 5 months but Apple were not interested as they only want to sell more of their products. Went to Bluewater outlet in Kent only to be told they did not have time and I would have to return 3 days later and wait in a queue. I'll stay with Android in the future
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work really well
customer_reviews.text: Love the AirPods. Work at a distance of maybe 20 feet from the phone. Clear sound, great for phone calls , quick charge
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grimsley

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: These air pods are brilliant. I was a bit worried about the high price for them wondering if they are worth that much money. Well, after using them, that worry simply disappeared. From the design, in ear fit, to the sound quality, they are brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Gadget

customer_reviews.title: One of them was faulty
customer_reviews.text: One of the headphone didn’t work properly unfortunately so had to send back for a refund. Will buy directly from apple next time. Amazons service was good though
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Apple Airpods - A short story
customer_reviews.text: I was finally able to purchase these on an Amazon deal which came into my budget. They are amazing as many reviews point out. However, two months in and the left unit just stopped working. I followed all recommended restore advice but was unable to resolve. The Apple Store in Brighton stepped in, ran all diagnostics, thanks Tom, and the airpod was replaced. Back and enjoying the great sounds and fun.
customer_reviews.author: daniel.robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quality device
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality and high prices have put me off getting Bluetooth earphones before but these are excellent - great sound quality and very easy to pair with devices (it took seconds to connect with an iPhone and Mac for the first time and not much longer with a Kindle Fire). I like the earbud style but if you like the ‘plug’ style these may not be for you (the AirPod pros might be worth a look).
customer_reviews.author: Ducti

customer_reviews.title: Quality of a £20 wireless earphones...
customer_reviews.text: Very bad sound insulation as even if the earphones are on low, people around you can hear alot. If you put your hands in the same pocket as your phone, the signal cuts out. And when the singal does come back, the quality of the music changes. Also, when this happens, the L/R earphones will go out of sync. If you leave your phone in one room and go to the next it cuts out. I have cheaper headphones that are about £70 and the range is impressive. Then again, this is apple - not expecting anything other than an overpriced price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great for switching between iPhone and Mac quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love my AirPods - having used many cheaper alternatives finally bit the bullet but glad I did. I use every day for Skype calls and they work well. I use them with an external mic just to make for better call quality (microphone works well on iPhone but slightly differently when links with a Mac). I end up wandering round the house with them in thanks to no wires and the quick link between iPhone and Mac is really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: Nice to use but the sound is so poor. I could hear the traffic around me louder than the music, even on full blast. No bass and the sound is inconsistent. I switched from beatsX and didn’t have that problem with them. The battery dwindled quickly and I HATE that you can’t change the volume without getting Siri involved. Have had to return them. Disappointed as they were so recommended to me. Overrated.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Apple AirPods
customer_reviews.text: The AirPods are excellent, much better than any other Bluetooth headphones I have tried. There have been a couple of foibles such as if you take the earphones out of your ears and leave them in the desk you sometimes have to be it them back in the case as they desynchronise from the phone eventually. This does not detract from making them the best Bluetooth earphones I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Connectability
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an old pair of hen 1 Airpods for which the battery died after 2 years. Although they are much more expensive than the cheapish bluetooth buds I replaced those original Airpods with, the sheer convenience of being able to keep them in my pocket and quickly swap between phone, mac, iPad, Watch or Apple TV wins it for anyone in the Apple ecosystem, and was something I sorely missed
customer_reviews.author: Solublepeter

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve resisted buying these for some time, mainly due to the price, but as I have three iPhones, iPad, iMac and MacBook I thought why not? The sound quality is unexpectedly amazing, I really didn’t expect it to be this good, rich and powerful, amazing. I’ve only just got them so will update in six months, but I must say my initial feelings are typical Apple, overpriced but brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Ozalid

customer_reviews.title: Superb functionality and great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Bluetooth ear buds out there. My favourite feature is how the connected iPhone recognises when the charging box is open and gives you a visual graphic stating the remaining battery life of the AirPods and charging box. Another great Apple product. The only flaw is lack of true noise cancellation but if that’s important to you then you can pay the extra and step-up to the Pro version. At this price though (£118) there are no complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H, Dorset

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym. Anything else is a no go
customer_reviews.text: This product started off great. However after 6 months of use, my airpods have developed a faulty mic and people say they cannot hear me even when im inside and in a confined space. Also the airpods do not disconnect after i take them out of my ear and i can literally still hear my music playing for 10-15 seconds after i put them back in my case in which they should turn off immediately after removing out of your ear! They also start twitching and the volume twitches in one ear compared to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: Lower than my expectation and was very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews on amazon, but I have decided to write this review. I received the first generation airpods which was what I had purchased, but the box it came in was a second generation airpod box. I knew that my airpods were not second generation because they are not wirelessly chargeable. Also, apples verification let me know I was given the wrong box for my airpods. Therefore, I would like to make it known to other customers that I received the wrong box with the wrong generation of airpods and I hope this does not happen to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
